sources.title: The President's Mystery (1936) MYSTERY
sources.description: A millionaire goes into hiding when his personal life begins to crumble butÂ must rethink his situation when he is accused of murdering his wife.

sources.title: The President's Mystery (1936) MYSTERY
sources.description:
Stars: Henry Wilcoxon, Betty Furness, Sidney Blackmer
Director: Phil Rosen
Writer: Franklin D. Roosevelt (story)

A millionaire with a crumbling personal life, comes up with a brilliant idea on how he can disappear, start a new life, and take all his money with him!

metadata.Plot: A millionaire with a crumbling personal life comes up with an idea on how he can disappear, start a new life without anyone knowing who he is and be able to take all his money with him.
metadata.Writer: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Rupert Hughes, Samuel Hopkins Adams
metadata.Actors: Henry Wilcoxon, Betty Furness, Sidney Blackmer
